original_title: ‘Daddy’ Trump and Western Europe’s oath of allegiance — RT World News
article_summary: "FDA Warns of Radioactive Shrimp in Walmart's Great Value Brand: Potentially contaminated frozen shrimp imported from Indonesia may contain cesium-137, a radioactive isotope that can cause DNA damage and increase cancer risk. The FDA has urged consumers not to consume, sell, or serve the affected shrimp, and Walmart has removed it from stores."</s>
